about_the_game:
Summon extreme monsters!

Included

  • Summon Beacon(40Lv) 30EA : Summon special Level 40 Boss monster.
  • Summon Beacon(50Lv) 30EA : Summon special Level 50 Boss monster.
  • Summon Beacon(60Lv) 30EA : Summon special Level 60 Boss monster.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT440
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
